entries.value: Find me a job. I will upload my resume in a moment. Use that and my linkedin profile www.linkedin.com/in/chrispravetz to figure out what sort of jobs I should pursue and make a plan to find those jobs, both published and unpublished. Create a list of people or organizations I should contact and provide draft messages for each. Create lists of posted jobs I should apply to and create cover letters and customized resumes for each. Figure out a way to continue to monitor the internet for future job posts that match the target jobs.
Based on my resume and LinkedIn profile (www.linkedin.com/in/chrispravetz), what are the top5 job roles I should pursue?

description: Create customized resumes for each job role

entries.value: What are the key skills and qualifications required for the job roles identified in step1?
What are the top5 posted jobs I should apply to for the job roles identified in step1?

description: Identify top posted jobs to apply to
Create cover letters for each posted job

entries.value: How can I continue to monitor the internet for future job posts that match the target jobs?

description: Identify ways to monitor job posts

entries.value: What are the top5 organizations I should contact for the job roles identified in step1?

description: Create draft messages for each organization

entries.value: What are the key requirements for a customized resume for a job role?

description: Identify key requirements for customized resumes

entries.value: As a researcher agent, what is the most effective way to gather information on a new topic?

description: Initial research on effective information gathering methods
Generate a detailed research plan based on initial findings

entries.value: Gather information according to the detailed research plan

description: Delegate information gathering task to a sub-agent

entries.value: Analyze and validate the gathered information for accuracy and relevance

prompt.value: Final report on the research findings

value.description: Generate final report on research findings

prompt.value: Refine research approach and gather more information

value.description: Refine research approach based on analysis

goal.value: Gather more information according to the refined research approach

prompt.value: Analyze and validate additional gathered information
Final report on the research findings including additional information

value.description: Generate final report including additional findings

outputs.finalReport: Final report on the research including additional findings

description: Decide on the sufficiency of the validated information
